source_sentence: 長爪梵志請問經
translation: Sutra of the Questions of the Long-clawed Brahmā

source_sentence: 大唐三藏法師義淨奉　制譯
translation: translated by the Tripiṭaka Master Yijingfeng of the Great Tang

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，薄伽梵在王舍城鷲峯山中，與大苾芻眾千二百五十人俱，
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, the Bhagavān was staying at Vulture Peak in the city of Rājagṛha, accompanied by one thousand two hundred and fifty bhikṣus.

source_sentence: 并餘苾芻、苾芻尼、近事男、近事女、國王、大臣、沙門、婆羅門、外道之類，
translation: And the other bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, those who serve males and females, kings, ministers, śramaṇas, brāhmaṇas, as well as heretics.

source_sentence: 天、龍、藥叉、人非人等，瞻仰而住。
translation: Gods, dragons, yakṣas, humans, and non-humans look up to him and stay there.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊為說自證微妙之法，所謂初中後善，文義巧妙，純一圓滿，
translation: At that time, the World-honored One expounded to them the subtle teaching of self-realization. It was so-called “good in the beginning,” “good in the middle,” “good in the end,” and “ impeccably elegant in meaning,” being one and complete [in all respects].

source_sentence: 清淨鮮白，梵行之相。
translation: Pure and pure white is the characteristic of religious practice.

source_sentence: 爾時，有一長爪梵志，來詣佛所，策杖而立，問言：「喬答摩！
translation: At the time, there was a long-clawed priest who came to the Buddha, stood up with his staff, and asked, Gautama!

source_sentence: 汝曾實作如是宣說，世由自業，業為能授，業為生處，業為親族，業為所依耶！」
translation: Did you really say in this way that the world is based on its own actions, which are capable of being taught, which are places of birth, which are relatives, and which are the bases of action?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我作是說，世由自業，業為能授，業為生處，業為親族，
translation: The Buddha said to the brāhmaṇa: I teach that it is by reason of one’s own deeds that a bodhisattva bestows enlightenment upon others, that he is born in virtue of these deeds, and that he is related to them.

source_sentence: 業為所依。」
translation: Karma is the basis.

source_sentence: 婆羅門曰：「若如是者，沙門喬答摩！
translation: The Brāhmaṇa said, If it's like this, the ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得金剛不壞堅固之身？」
translation: What did you do in the past to cause you to attain a body that's adamantine and resolute?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離殺害有情命根，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I parted with the life root of killing sentient beings and now attain this result because of the power of their actions.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得手指纖長網縵為相？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that caused you to attain the characteristic of a long, slender web of fingers?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離偷盜他人財物，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from stealing someone else's property, and because of the power of that person's actions, I've now attained this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得具足色力諸根圓滿？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that will cause you to attain the fulfillment of form and strength and the completion of your faculties?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離女人欲染之事，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from the defilement of women's desires, and because of the power of their actions, I now attain this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得出廣長舌，自覆其面？」
translation: What action did you do in the past that caused you to produce a long, wide tongue and cover your own face?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離妄語詭誑於人，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from lying and deceiving people, and because of the power of their actions, I've now attained this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得威儀庠序，如師子行？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that caused you to attain a dignified demeanor like the conduct of a lion?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離諸酒放逸之處，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from the place of alcohol and laziness, and because of the power of that karma, I've now attained this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得微妙相好，莊嚴其身？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that will cause you to attain subtle features and adorn your body?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離歌舞倡艶之事，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from singing, dancing, and performing good deeds, and because of the power of their actions, I've now attained this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得上妙香氣，芬馥其身？」
translation: What action did you do in the past that caused you to attain a supremely wonderful fragrance and perfume your body?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離香花瓔珞莊飾，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from being adorned with fragrant flowers and jewelry, and because of the power of that karma, I've now attained this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得受用金剛勝妙之座？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that will cause you to attain the supremely marvelous vajra throne?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離高床大床驕恣之物，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from high beds and large beds and arrogant things, and because of the power of their actions, I've now attained this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得四十牙齒鮮白齊平？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that caused you to attain the whiteness and evenness of forty teeth?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離非時飲噉諸食，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, In a previous life, I was far removed from drinking and eating at an ungodly hour and because of the power of that karma, I've now attained this fruit.

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得頂上肉髻圓滿姝好？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that will cause you to attain a perfectly round and beautiful topknot of flesh on your head?

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，於三寶、二師沙門、婆羅門、父母、尊長，
translation: The Buddha said to the brāhmaṇa: In my previous existence, I was a follower of the teachings of the Three Treasures (i.e., the Mahāprajñāpāramitā), the two śramaṇas and brāhmaṇas (śrāmaṇeras) of the two masters (i.e., Samantabhadra and Vimalakīr

source_sentence: 應恭敬處，五輪著地，以無慢心虔誠致禮，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: At the place of veneration, he puts his five wheels on the ground and pays homage with no conceit and reverence, and it's because of the power of their actions that this fruit is now obtained.

source_sentence: 時婆羅門，見佛為說因果不虛，白言：「喬答摩！
translation: Seeing the Buddha's explanation of cause and effect for him, the Brāhmaṇa didn't lie, but said, Gautama!

source_sentence: 此名何福？
translation: What's this name for merit?

source_sentence: 云何受持？」
translation: How do you receive and uphold it?

source_sentence: 佛言：「此名八支淨戒，若能一日一夜，或復長時，從師受持，獲果如是。」
translation: The Buddha said, These are called the eight limbs of the pure precepts; if they can receive and uphold them from a teacher for one day and night or for another long time, they'll attain their fruit like this.

source_sentence: 爾時長爪梵志，既於佛所聞說八支日夜淨戒，由先遠離鄙惡業故，便能獲得勝妙莊嚴，
translation: It was then that the long-clawed brahmin, having heard the Buddha teach the eight precepts of purity day and night from the buddhas, attained their supremely beautiful adornment because he had previously been far removed from coarse and evil actions.

source_sentence: 深心信受，歡喜踊躍，即於佛前捨高慢心，投杖于地，合掌恭敬，禮佛雙足，
translation: Having deeply believed and accepted it, they rejoiced and jumped for joy. They abandoned their arrogance in the presence of the Buddha, cast down their staffs on the ground, joined their palms in respect, and venerated him by bowing at his feet.

source_sentence: 白言：「世尊！
translation: He said, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今始知善惡之業感報不虛，我從今日乃至盡形，歸依佛陀兩足中尊；
translation: I now realize that the rewards of good and evil deeds are not false. From today until the end of my life, I take refuge in Buddha, the most honorable among two-legged buddhas.

source_sentence: 乃至盡形，歸依達磨離欲中尊；
translation: At the end of his physical form, he relied on Bodhidharma, the most honored among the dispassionate.

source_sentence: 乃至盡形，歸依僧伽諸眾中尊。
translation: Up to the end of his form, he relies on the honored among the saṃgha.

source_sentence: 「不害一切命，　　不盜他財物，
translation: They won’t harm all living beings, won’t steal others’ property,

source_sentence: 不婬不妄語，　　飲酒放逸處，
translation: They don’t covet and don’t speak falsehoods, drink alcohol and indulge in heedlessness.

source_sentence: 花莊及歌舞，　　高大非時食，
translation: Flower decorations and singing and dancing are too high to be eaten at proper times.

source_sentence: 我今悉遠離，　　受持淨八支。」
translation: Now, I'm completely free of them, accepting and upholding the pure eight limbs.

source_sentence: 我受八支近住淨戒，始從今時，乃至明旦日出已來，於其中間：第二、第三亦如是說。
translation: I'll accept the eight proximate forms of pure precepts, starting from now until tomorrow morning when the sun rises. Among them, the second and third are likewise explained:

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「善哉！
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 如是應作，如是應持。」
translation: Thus should it be done, and thus should it be maintained.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊，說是法已，時婆羅門，及苾芻眾，諸人天等，皆大歡喜，信受奉行。
translation: After the Bhagavān had explained this teaching, the Brāhmaṇas, monks, humans, gods, and so forth all rejoiced greatly and believed it and carried it out.

source_sentence: 長爪梵志請問經
translation: Sutra of the Questions of the Long-clawed Brahmā
